price: ߊ߲ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߸ ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ ߣߌ߲߬ ߟߊߥߌ߬ߟߌ߫ ߒ߬ ߞߊ߲߬ ߸ ߓߊߏ߬ ߟߊߒߠߦߊߓߊ߮ ߟߵߊ߲ ߘߌ߫
arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكۡشِفۡ عَنَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ik'shif ʿannā al-ʿadhāba innā mu'minūna
